00001 #include <sstream>
00002 
00003 #include "ys_cust_type.h"
00004 
00005 using namespace std;
00006    
00007 string YardCustType::ToString(const string& delim, bool quotes) const {
00008     
00009     stringstream output;
00010     char q = '\'';
00011     output << GetAccountNumber() << delim 
00012         << q << GetFirstName() << q << delim 
00013         << q << GetMiddleName() << q << delim 
00014         << q << GetLastName() << q << delim 
00015         << q << GetAddress() << q << delim
00016         << q << GetPhone() << q << delim 
00017         << q << GetCity() << q << delim 
00018         << q << GetZip() << q << delim
00019         << q << GetCreditCardNumber() << q << delim
00020         << q << GetCreditCardExpiration() << q << delim
00021         << q << GetCreditCardName() << q << delim
00022         << q << GetSigLocal() << q << delim
00023         << q << GetPicLocal() << q << delim
00024         << q << GetSince() << q << delim
00025         << GetHash(); // so it will return 0 for null
00026     return output.str();
00027         
00028 }
